alert.note: Alert for Boone; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 8:21PM CDT until November 04 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MARION AND EASTERN BOONE COUNTIES... At 820 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Forsyth to near Diamond City to near Winington, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals... Flippin... Diamond City... Bergman... Lead Hill... Pyatt... Dodd City... Price Place... Ozark Isle... Willis... Lakeway... Winington... Clark Hill... Bull Shoals State Park... Bellefonte... Crumpler Subdivision... Zinc... South Lead Hill... Fairview in Marion County... Monarch... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
